summary: In the 22nd century, a scientist attempts to right the wrong his ancestor created: the puzzle box that opens the gates of Hell and unleashes Pinhead and his Cenobite legions.
cast: Bruce Ramsay|Valentina Vargas|Doug Bradley|Charlotte Chatton|Adam Scott|Kim Myers|Mickey Cottrell|Louis Turenne|Courtland Mead|Louis Mustillo|Jody St. Michael|Paul Perri|Pat Skipper|Christine Harnos|Wren T. Brown|Tom Dugan|Michael Polish|Mark Polish|Jimmy Schuelke|David Schuelke|Laura Albert|Ellen Albertini Dow|Phil Fondacaro|Andrew Magnus|Mack Miles|Cynthia Dale Scott|Jeff Shrewsbury|Kenneth Tobey|Robert Wisdom
title: Hellraiser 4 El final de la dinast√≠a sangrienta
